attributes.action: We want the government to take immediate action on the Calais Crisis!
attributes.background: we want action taken because Immigrants are entering the UK illegally. They may not have money, which will lead them to make robberies around the UK streets and shops. They will take away the few jobs that we have which means our own British people may end up homeless. We need to speak up!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to contain a clear statement explaining what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to start a new petition, explaining more specifically what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. Or you may find that there is already a petition about the situation in Calais which you would like to sign. You can view all open petitions here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open
